thread.section_title: Hiberia Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location, very helpful receptionist
thread.title_full: Great location, very helpful receptionist - Review of Hiberia Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: abdelrahman a
title: Great location, very helpful receptionist
text:
Location is convenient, close to most places you want to see in Rome.
The reception guys are very helpful and friendly.
Room size is small, medium size tv and there is fridge.
Breakfast is just ok
There was no coverage for cellphone inside the room!
No view from the room assigned to me
